page.title: 11Shops Garage and Farm
page.content: The block of shops comprises a hairdressers salon,butchers,newsagents which also houses the sub post office,a chemist,a small grocers supermarket and a greengrocers.These shops are closed half a day on Mondays.There is also a video hire shop an outfitters and a D.I.Y and garden shop.There is also a garage called Trentley Service Station.This garage provides servicing and body repair work.It was the most expensive of the garages for petrol but is open 7 days a week and petrol is served to customers.On New Inn Lane is the farm called New Inn Lane Mill.This seems to be the oldest building in this part of Trentham.Here geese,hens and horses can be seen from the road.Almost opposite to this is a private house where about 20 hens are kept and again these can be seen from the road.
